titleStmt.title: Britannic√¶ virtutis imago. Or, The effigies of true fortitude, expressed to the life, in the famous actions of that incomparable knight, Major Generall Smith, who is here represented, June, 1644.
titleStmt.author: Walsingham, Edward, d. 1663.

notesStmt.note: A eulogy of Sir John Smith.
Dedication signed E. W. [i.e. Edward Walsingham].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
